commitResults.messageTitle: Rename chatbot to Alexis
feat: Add greeting
feat: Add echo to Alexis.java
commitResults.messageBody: Alexis will echo the command entered by the user.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Implement exit on command `bye` to Alexis.java
commitResults.messageBody:
Alexis only echos one message and terminates.

Implementing exit on `bye` allows Alexis to echo any number of
messages. When user types in the command `bye`, Alexis will exit.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add ability to store text in Alexis.java
feat: Add ability to list stored text in Alexis.java
commitResults.messageBody:
Users are not able to see the stored text as they are not displayed.

Let's implement a feature for Alexis to display the stored text when
requested by users through the command `list`.

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: Refactor tasks to new class Task
feat: Add TaskList class for task handling
commitResults.messageBody:
TaskList class encapsulates all task operations to add, mark, unmark and
print tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: style: Modify code to comply with coding standard
fix: Modify Scanner instantiation and loop for input processing
commitResults.messageBody: • Move Scanner to a single instance outside the main loop

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add TaskType enum

refactor: Extract method from addTask() to Task subclasses

• getToDo() abstracted to ToDo class
• getDeadline() abstracted to Deadline class
• getEvent() abstracted to Event class
• Improves readibility of addTask() method

commitResults.messageTitle: style: Modify print statement for adding and marking tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: Implement switch statement to replace conditionals

• Utilised switch statements for improved readability
• Extracted methods within switch statements to improve readability

commitResults.messageBody: • catches when no number is given for commands `mark` and `unmark`
